title: Bug 6304 - Cannot synchronize a .java file and another resource
OB: When selecting a .java file and another resource (e.g., a .properties file) in the package viewer and opening the context menu, the 'Team' entry is missing. However, it should be present.
EB: When selecting a .java file and another resource (e.g., a .properties file) in the package viewer and opening the context menu, the 'Team' entry is not present. It should be visible.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Select a .java file and another resource (e.g., a .properties file) in the package viewer. 2. Open the context menu.
